BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-AltlocExplorer
BundleInfo.Author: UCSF RBVI
BundleInfo.Description: High-resolution structures may have several different possible positions for an atom. ChimeraX only depicts one position for an atom. This tool allows the user to determine which atoms have alternate locations and to change the depiction to those locations if desired.

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: Tool :: Altloc Explorer :: Structure Analysis :: interact with alternate atom locations
